                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                             java.io.IOException
        Writes a text string to the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be written to.
        content - The content to write.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the file doesn't exist, is null, a directory or is read only.
        java.io.IOException - IOException.
